full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### Title
Title (TIre-eng): Evaluation and Statistical Performance Review of the Technical Elements of PA Policy, DFO 2009
Title (TIre-francais): Évaluation et exaMen du Rendement Statistique des Éléments Techniques de la Politique sur l'AP, MPO 2009

### Solicitation Details
* **Reference Number (Numéro de Référence)**: CB-5052-55918677
* **Amendment Number (Numéro de Modification)**: 6
* **Solicitation Number (Numéro de La Sollicitation)**: 30002646B
* **Publication Date (Date de Publication)**: 2023-04-26
* **Tender Closing Date (Date de Clôture des Offre)**: 2023-05-26T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date (Date de Modification)**: 2023-05-25

### Contract Details
* **Expected Contract Start Date (Date de Début du Contrat)**: 2023-06-01
* **Expected Contract End Date (Date de Fin du Contrat)**: 2026-03-31

### Status of the Tender
* **Tender Status (Statut de l'Appel Offre)**: Cancelled

### Notice of Invitation
Fisheries and Oceans Canada requires the services of one or more senior fisheries science analysts to provide an evaluation and statistical performance review of the technical elements of PA Policy, DFO 2009, and technical analyses of potential revisions, additions or clarifications to the PA Policy. The proposed period of contract shall be from contract award to March 31, 2025. There is also an irrevocable option to extend the contract by a one-year period.

You can download the following documents:
* [Solicitation Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5052/30002646b---rfp.pdf)
* [Addendum 01 - English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5052/30002646b---addendum-01---english.pdf)
* [Addendum 02 - English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5052/30002646b---addendum-
